data.name: Calculate the stars
data.description:
John Doe is a business man that wants to have an e-commerce website like Amazon, so he asked his friend John Smith a programmer to develop it. Now the last functionality of the website is the Product Review Stars/Ratings. Where in it calculates the stars/ratings based on the users who rated the Product. Product Name: Keyboard
Product Rating: 4.5/5.0
Example:
Sample Array: [5, 3, 8, 10, 0]
Detailed Rating Breakdown:
5 star(s) = 5 votes
4 star(s) = 3 votes
3 star(s) = 8 votes
2 star(s) = 10 votes
1 star(s) = 0 votes The total rating would be: 3.1/5.0 Additional Notes:
-It should return with 1 decimal place.
-If the sum of ratings is negative or null return 0
